title: De non temerandis ecclesiis A tract of the rights and respect due vnto churches. Written to a gentleman, who hauing an appropriate parsonage, imploied the church to prophane vses, and left the parishioners vncertainely prouided of diuine seruice, in a parish neere there adioyning. By Sr. Henry Spelman knight.
author: Spelman, Henry, Sir, 1564?-1641.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Iohn Beale, and are to be sold by William Welby,
